author: Richard Plews
comment: Works exactly as advertised, using Nexus 5, Moto 360 + GoPro Hero4 Black. Suggested features are support for ambient to save watch battery, option to remove some of the modes (eg. if you only wanted to switch between photo & video) and lastly potentially the ability to set up profiles to easily switch between video modes (4k 30fps -> 1080p 120fps with one touch)

author: Peter Halak
comment: Works as advertised on Sony SmartWatch 3 and is a cool extension to the goPro app on my phone. Can only recommend if you are Sony SW3 and GoPro owner.

author: Patrick Madelo
comment: I hope it will support settings mode. It work fine though.
title: 5 star but...

author: David Kenneth Brown
comment: App does not appear on my SmartWatch 2, anyone have any ideas?

comment: Can't use at my Gear S and can't refund too...

comment: Only the record button works. Nothing else.
